description: Detect Attempt PrintNightmare (CVE-2021-1675) Remote code execution in Windows Spooler Service
false_positives: Account fallback reasons (after failed login with specific account)
name: Suspicious Rejected SMB Guest Logon From IP
query: (winlog.event_id:"31017" AND winlog.event_data.Description:*Rejected\ an\ insecure\ guest\ logon* AND UserName:"" AND ServerName:\\1*)
author: Florian Roth
KevTheHermit
fuzzyf10w
